# lodash.uniq v3.2.2

The [modern build](https://github.com/lodash/lodash/wiki/Build-Differences) of [lodashâ€™s](https://lodash.com/) `_.uniq` exported as a [Node.js](http://nodejs.org/)/[io.js](https://iojs.org/) module.

## Installation

Using npm:

```bash
$ {sudo -H} npm i -g npm
$ npm i --save lodash.uniq
```

In Node.js/io.js:

```js
var uniq = require('lodash.uniq');
```

See the [documentation](https://lodash.com/docs#uniq) or [package source](https://github.com/lodash/lodash/blob/3.2.2-npm-packages/lodash.uniq) for more details.
